description.text:
(Translated from Chinese by AI)
1. New Feature: Allows switching between light/dark theme modes within the launcher.
2. New Feature: Allows setting the volume of the video background.
3. Fixed an issue where cancelling edits to the directional control key style would still take effect.
4. Added compatibility detection for the Ixeris mod.

（若启动器内下载缓慢请使用网盘下载,64位的请下载arm64，不知道该下哪个的请下载all）
1.新增功能：允许启动器内切换亮色/暗色主题模式
2.新增功能：允许设置视频背景的音量
3.修复编辑方向控制键样式时取消后依然生效的问题
4.增加对Ixeris模组的兼容性检测
